timeline
title Timeline de Pago (Security_OAuth2)
T0ms : Usuario submit pago form
T10ms : Payment service recibe request
: 5ms idempotency check (Security_Encryption)
: 8ms JWT validation (Security_IntrusionDetection)
T25ms : 12ms wallet balance check (Security_OAuth2)
: 15ms reserve funds (Security_Encryption)
: Total sync: 40ms
T50ms : Response enviada a usuario
: 10ms network latency
T60ms : Usuario ve: Transaction ID + éxito
: (Security_OAuth2)
T150ms : Fraud service recibe evento
: 30ms historical data query (Security_IntrusionDetection)
: 40ms ML inference (Security_Firewall)
: 20ms DynamoDB writes
: Total: ~90ms
T250ms : Payment service enqueue a SQS
: (Security_OAuth2)
T400ms : Bank responds + ePayco confirms
: 100ms network time
: 100ms bank processing
: 50ms response + parse
: Total: ~250ms
T420ms : Transaction update + publish
: 5ms transaction update
: 10ms idempotency store
: 5ms SNS publish
T500ms : Notifications sent (Security_IntrusionDetection)
: Email enqueued
: SMS enqueued
T1000ms : User checks app
: Sees "Confirmed"
